name: How the stones tell of the ones who fell
name_original: How the stones tell of the ones who fell
description:
• This is messy junk. Maybe unclear. Not proof-read, not re-read, certainly not playtested. Make shit up or contact me if you need to.
  • This is a rough draft cobbled together in less than a week, but I think there might be some interesting things inside.
  • I've got big plans for it but uh as usual, I don't know how likely I am to ever come back to it. 

Credits

Some icons from game-icons.net.

If you actually like it and want more, leave a comment as a mark on my world, so I can remember you forever and ever. Maybe check out my other weird shit.
